https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/y4tmLI0YQnLhoxkUw3b72A6vZ0I.jpg When we first meet Lucia she is withdrawn and isolated from her friends and family, dealing with anxiety attacks and a legion of secrets. But when she meets bright and carefree Olivia, Lucia seizes the opportunity to break out of her shell and live the life she was afraid to admit she wanted. A Winter to Remember
